snippet.title: Arise: A Simple Story - Definitive Edition | Switch Announcement
snippet.description:
https://www.arise-game.com

Arise: A Simple Story - Definitive Edition brings the critically acclaimed game to the Nintendo Switch with a bunch of exclusive content and features. 

In this 3D, time manipulation narrative adventure you embark on a journey about happiness and hardship, joy and sorrow. A story that all of us will one day experience - the loss of our closest loved ones and how we remember them. Manipulate time, solve puzzles, and reshape surroundings as you push forward into the bittersweet recollections of a past life.

Launching on Nintendo Switch on April 28th, 2022.

To keep up with Untold Tales and Arise. follow us wherever you prefer: 
Website - https://untoldtales.games/ 
Facebook - https://facebook.com/untoldtalesgames 
Twitter - https://twitter.com/untoldtalesHQ
Discord - https://discord.gg/vy8A33V533
